title: 116: Vikram and Meeru’s Excellent Restaurant Adventure
itunes:title: 116: Vikram and Meeru’s Excellent Restaurant Adventure
itunes:subtitle: This week, the new Indian cooking with Meeru Dhalwala and Vikram Vij, hunting to eat with Louise Gray, Dan Pashman of WNYC's The Sporkful podcast plays with breakfast cereal, and our recipe for creamy pasta sauce.
description:
This week, the new Indian cooking with Meeru Dhalwala and Vikram Vij, hunting to eat with Louise Gray, Dan Pashman of WNYC’s The Sporkful podcast plays with breakfast cereal, and our recipe for creamy pasta sauce.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
